name: Predestination 3D Ship Designer - A Turn-Based Space 4X Game
blurb: Space 4X game Predestination is nearing completion. We secured local funding towards a 3D ship designer, so we need your support again.

rewards.reward: STANDALONE SHIP DESIGNER \r\nReceive a digital download of a standalone version of the 3D ship designer. We'll throw in digital downloads of our concept art, wallpapers and soundtrack at release (all DRM-free, use them how you want). NOTE: Does not include full Predestination game

------- PRE-ORDER THE GAME ------- \r\nIf you missed the original Kickstarter campaign, use this tier to get a digital DRM-free copy of the full Predestination game with exclusive Kickstarter-only content. The game will, of course, include the ship designer when it's ready.

PRE-ORDER + FREE DLC FOR LIFE \r\nOur most popular tier from our original Kickstarter.  Get a DRM-free digital copy of the game with exclusive Kickstarter-only content, free DLC for life, and a free copy of every expansion pack we release. We plan to release at least $25 of DLC and at least one expansion pack.

PRE-ORDER + BETA + GIFT COPY \r\nEverything in the $25 reward, plus a digital gift copy of the game to send to a friend. You'll also get guaranteed access to our current mini betas and final beta version and early beta access to the ship designer.

***TIER FOR PREVIOUS BACKERS*** This tier is designed for people who backed our first Kickstarter or pre-ordered Predestination via Paypal and don't need another copy of the game. *** DOUBLE-BACKER BONUS: Name a star in Predestination. *** You will also be immortalised by name as an elite ship crew member in the final game as per the main $50 tier. Does not come with a copy of Predestination. Does come with a copy of the standalone ship designer. Only 50 available.

-- CREW MEMBER + BETA + GIFT -- \r\nEverything in the $40 reward, plus you will be immortalised by name as an elite ship crew member in the final game. Large ships will have a crew list and Elite crew members are rare crew that start with above average experience. If you don't want to use your real name, or if you want to buy this for someone as a gift, you can name your crew member anything you like! Only 50 available.

***TIER FOR PREVIOUS BACKERS*** This tier is designed for people who backed our first Kickstarter or pre-ordered Predestination via Paypal and don't need another copy of the game. *** DOUBLE-BACKER BONUS: Name a Nebula in Predestination or name two stars, your choice! ***  We'll also work with you to outline and name a ship technology or weapon as per the other $75 tier. Does not come with a copy of Predestination. Does come with the standalone ship designer. Only 10 available.

DESIGN A SHIP TECH/WEAPON  \r\nEverything in the $40 reward, plus we'll work with you to outline and name a ship technology (eg. cloaking shield, utility carrier) or weapon (eg. black hole generator, deathray) based on your own ideas. You'll also get a mention in the game credits for your design contribution! Only 10 available.

------- COLLECTOR'S EDITION ------- \r\nA limited edition physical DVD of the finished game with bonus extra content, beta access and free DLC for life. We'll also send you a pack full of goodies: Exclusive posters, a physical soundtrack CD, and other things that will never be released again after release. It will include signed personal thank-you post cards from each of the team members, and a free digital gift copy to give to a friend.
-DESIGN A NEW DEFAULT SHIP-\r\nEverything in the $100 collector's edition, plus design and name a new default ship using the ship designer for your choice of our 6 core races. Only 25 available.

SIGNED CUSTOM SHIP DESIGN POSTER\r\nEverything in the $125 collector's edition, plus your own professionally printed, signed A1 poster of your ship design, and a full set of ship-themed branded postcards.

EXCLUSIVE ART COLLECTOR EDITION\r\nFor the art fans, our concept artist will paint an A3 scene with your ship design on canvas. The concept will be discussed with you prior to painting, Includes everything in the $125 ship designer tier.

DESIGN THE REVENANT SHIPS\r\nEverything in the $100 collector's edition, plus work with our artist to design the Revenant ships, from concept to finished models. The Revenants are the 'Big Bad Guys' of Predestination, so only one person can claim this reward.
